title: 时装工坊死亡掉落
author: 斩魂最6
txt_content:
死亡不掉落都开了物品都不掉落就是带的时装掉落很奇怪emm
插件是最新版本的从官方下的
求dalao解决~~

replies.author: 粘兽
replies.txt_content:
斩魂最6 发表于 2019-8-3 19:22
# Should skins be dropped on player death.
    # 0 = use keep inventory rule
    # 1 = never d ...
在服务端的config/armourers_workshop/common.cfg中可以找到这些内容。

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
[整地]AlwaysKeepInventory —— 妈妈再也不用担心我死亡掉落了[1.7.2-1.14.3]
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-884881-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)

试试这个能不能修复

并且确认死亡不掉落是死亡世界开启了的？

replies.author: 斩魂最6
replies.txt_content:

replies.author: 斩魂最6
replies.txt_content:
零尘233 发表于 2019-8-3 19:05
看这个
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-875460-1-1.html
    # Should skins be dropped on player death.
    # 0 = use keep inventory rule
    # 1 = never drop
    # 2 = always drop
    I:dropSkinsOnDeath=1|
在哪修改捏
